title: No choice but to learn
excerpt: One of the joys of regularly publishing a blog is that you’re forced to learn and think and notice things  everyday .

children.text: One of the joys of regularly publishing a blog is that you’re forced to learn and think and notice things
Which tends to be a sharp contrast to the monotony of daily life.
Good thing too, because if you're not careful, you could spend your whole year not getting any smarter.
The converse is also true: if your intellectual bandwidth is at the same frequency it's always been, for years, it might be a sign you're actually getting
(Better to simply not give yourself the choice.)
